hero.description: Send, receive, and manage payments seamlessly across global markets with a single integration.

features.title: Everything you need to handle payments
features.subtitle: Our comprehensive suite of payment solutions is designed to help businesses of all sizes accept payments globally.

globalPayments.title: Global Payments
globalPayments.description: Accept payments from customers around the world with a single integration.

cardPayments.title: Card Payments
cardPayments.description: Accept all major credit and debit cards securely.

mobilePayments.title: Mobile Payments
mobilePayments.description: Integrate with popular mobile money providers across Africa, Asia, and beyond to reach billions of customers.

cryptoPayments.title: Crypto Payments
cryptoPayments.description: Accept cryptocurrency payments with instant conversion to fiat currencies and same-day settlements.

bankTransfers.title: Bank Transfers
bankTransfers.description: Direct bank transfers with instant notifications.

stats.title: Trusted by businesses worldwide
stats.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using our platform

solutions.title: Solutions for Every Business
solutions.subtitle: Whether you're a startup or an enterprise, our payment solutions can be tailored to meet your specific needs.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Optimize your online store with our seamless checkout experiences, fraud protection, and global payment methods.

marketplaces.title: Marketplaces
marketplaces.description: Manage complex payment flows between buyers and sellers with our powerful marketplace solutions.

saas.title: SaaS
saas.description: Streamline recurring billing with flexible subscription management tools and global payment processing.

testimonial.quote: Sunny Payments has transformed our global expansion. Their flexible payment options and robust API have increased our conversion rates by 35% across new markets.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: Join thousands of users managing payments globally

mfa.codeHelp: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
mfa.instructions: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
mfa.recoveryCodesDescription: Save these recovery codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator device.
mfa.recoveryCodesWarning: These codes will only be shown once. Make sure to save them.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.businessNameTooShort: Business name must be at least 2 characters
validation.documentsRequired: Please upload at least one document
validation.acceptTerms: Please accept the terms of service

verification.title: Verify your email
